column4: sorry. i went to the restroom. did we determine if gogeta's cpu was 64-bit?
some where yes but they where athlon64 not septrons
this will tell you if it's 32 or 64-bit: cat /proc/cpuinfo | grep clflush\ size
not always my atom comes up 64 bit with that
its not 64 it has some 64 support
the septron was made before 64 bit was thought of
sorry, i was thinking of the wrong command. it's getconf LONG_BIT
this will tell you also: sudo lshw -C cpu | grep width
i have 2 like that my n270 and this 3200+
i looked it up before and its some odd set they used when 64bit was starting up
gotcha. gotta love the emulations. messes everything up
i think they where bad 64 bis rebranded 32
thats pretty normal fo prosser makers
i popped in my 64 cd my mastake once and it did not work so who knoes
